title: Lung cancer.
summary: As a nursing student my knowledge of caring for patients with lung cancer had been rather limited. The article provided information on the risk factors for lung cancer, diagnostic investigations, treatment options and the nurse's role in improving qual â€¦
abstract: As a nursing student my knowledge of caring for patients with lung cancer had been rather limited. The article provided information on the risk factors for lung cancer, diagnostic investigations, treatment options and the nurse's role in improving quality of life and experience of care for patients.
